channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Rethinking Retirement Planning Amidst Aging Demographic Frontiers
item.description: Forward-thinking approaches to policy and wealth management are needed to ensure a better financial future across generations and income brackets.

item.title: Reality star Judge Judy says Gen Z are difficult to work with because they got too many trophies
item.description: Judge Judy says pandering parents have set Gen Z up to fail in the corporate rat race.

item.title: Book Review: The New World Economy in 5 Trends
item.description: A diligent economist and an eclectic bookworm serve up an analysis of megatrends that will have the greatest impact on economies and investments: innovation, productivity, climate, multiglobalization, debt, and aging.

item.title: Florida allows doctors to perform C-sections outside of hospitals
item.description: It is the first state to allow this, siding with a private equity-owned physicians group.

item.title: Factor Strategies Belong in Your Completion Portfolio Toolkit
item.description: Why wouldn't you include factor strategies in your completion portfolio? A review of the two commonly used approaches for managing institutional assets highlights their symbiotic nature.

item.title: Jamie Dimon is so over spectators questioning whether his possible move from CEO to chairman would be bad for JPMorgan: 'How the hell do they know? There's no magic to it'
item.description: "The board should do the right thing—if the chairman is getting in the way of the new CEO they should go. If the chairman is helping the new CEO in a million different ways they should stay."

item.title: For the Analyst: Peer Benchmarking Methods to Improve Earnings Forecasts
item.description: Peer benchmarking is a vexing task for financial analysts but one that is critical for forecasting earnings. This straightforward measure can help find peers for relative performance, compensation, and valuation benchmarking.

item.title: Massive ransomware network taken down by ‘Endgame’ international police operation
item.description: Police arrested four “high value” suspects, took down more than 100 servers and seized control of over 2,000 internet domains.

item.title: Building LLMs in the Open-Source Community: A Call to Action for Investment Professionals
item.description: Large language models like ChatGPT are changing the way we think about investing and reshaping roles in the investment profession.

item.title: Google promises $2 billion investment in Malaysia as Big Tech splurges on Southeast Asia spending
item.description: Google's pledge follows multi-billion dollar investment pledges from Microsoft and Amazon targeting Southeast Asia.
